description: Sabores Sixta Tulia specializes in natural products derived from medicinal plants, roots, and lianas. The business offers traditional and aphrodisiac drinks from the Pacific, including biche, a sugar cane product, and coconut-based sweets. With a strong ancestral knowledge, the initiative aims to provide health benefits while empowering families, particularly women, through its medicinal offerings. The venture has evolved into a family business, fostering generational involvement and community support.
name: Sabores Sixta Tulia
